name: Random Sports Party
description:
Face your friends in a sport where the rules change all the time !

Between 2 and 4 players only. Play with keyboard or controllers. To play with several people on the same keyboard, please change the controls in the options.

Standalone versions for Windows in downloads.

Default Controls : Game : ActionKeyboard ControllerMove / Aim
ArrowsLeft stickJumpSpace
